pageContext.claim: “The ramp that I descended after my West Point Commencement speech was very long & steep, had no handrail and, most importantly, was very slippery. The last thing I was going to do is “fall” for the Fake News to have fun with. Final ten feet I ran down to level ground. Momentum!”
pageContext.analysis: Video shows Trump quickened his pace for the last few steps of the ramp. He did not run the “final ten feet” nor did the ramp appear to be especially steep or long.
